system.Text:
__When you socialize, share intimacy, or find a moment of peace__, roll +heart.

On a __strong hit__, you find companionship or comfort and your spirit is strengthened. If you are shaken, clear the impact and take +1 spirit. Otherwise, take +2 spirit. If you make this move as you @Compendium[foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.3de42d2d3cb78855]{Sojourn}, take +1 more.

On a __weak hit__, as above, but this indulgence is fleeting. Envision an interruption, complication, or inner conflict. Then, @Compendium[foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.93d2d69b7e2b85e1]{Lose Momentum} (-1).

On a __miss__, you take no comfort and the situation worsens. @Compendium[foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.78baa51694fe37c5]{Pay the Price}.
